entry.tran: 莎笼，围裙(尤指马来西亚人围在腰间或裹在身上的一块长布)
entry.def: A sarong is a piece of clothing that is worn especially by Malaysian men and women. It consists of a long piece of cloth wrapped round the waist or body.

means.word_mean: 1. a loose skirt consisting of brightly colored fabric wrapped around the body; worn by both women and men in the South Pacific
